credit_line: Museum purchase through the gift of Mrs. Edward C. Post
title: Design for Musaphonic Clock Radio, in Blue, General Electric
provenance: Norman Brosterman, New York, NY; Richard Arbib, New York, NY
medium: pastel, gouache, watercolor, pen and black ink, graphite on vellum
description: Perspective for clock radio, featuring larger speaker enclosure on left hand side and smaller tuning and clock enclosure on right hand side.  Speaker features a concave "v"-shaped grill with brass band surround and "Musiphonic" script at lower right.  Tuning and volume knobs feature are white with brass inserts.  Three clock control knobs in white. Clock hands in brass with blue insert.
name: Drawing
